title: Time will tell
body: I planted a pair of these as bare roots in November and they're doing well and flowering, the flowers are beautiful and smell DIVINE, however they lose marks as they flowers only look good and in full bloom for a maybe 2 days before they look sad and in need of deadheading. I also have a Lady of Shallot standard and 2 established lady of shallot shrubs and the flowers on those last so much longer.  I can only hope this will improve as the plants establish.

title: I am in heaven
body:
This is my first tree rose and I then bought 3 more. The Boscobel has got me … she is stunning and after 4 weeks she is still as beautiful as ever …. 
I want more …. 😍😍😍
